00017     public partial class NavigationControl : System.Web.UI.UserControl

00019         protected internal List<PWASNavigationNode> nodes;
00020 
00021         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00022         {
00023             InitNodes();
00024 
00025             this.NavTreeView.Nodes.Clear();
00026 
00027             foreach (var node in nodes)
00028             {
00029                 if (Security.IsAuthorized((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID], node.PwasObject, node.PwasAction, node.PwasScope))
00030                 {
00031                     this.NavTreeView.Nodes.Add(node);
00032                 }
00033             }
00034         }
00035 
00036         protected internal void InitNodes()
00037         {
00038             nodes = new List<PWASNavigationNode>();
00039             nodes.AddRange(new PWASNavigationNode[] {
00040                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.User, PwasAction = PwasAction.View, 
00041                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.All, Text = "Manage Users", NavigateUrl = "~/adminView_ManageAccounts.aspx" },
00042                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.Order, PwasAction = PwasAction.Create,
00043                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.Self, Text = "Create Order", NavigateUrl = "~/customer_create_order.aspx" },
00044                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.Order, PwasAction = PwasAction.View,
00045                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.Self, Text = "Manage Orders", NavigateUrl = "~/customer_view_order.aspx" },
00046                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction = PwasAction.Create,
00047                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.Self, Text = "Create Print Run", NavigateUrl = "~/workerView_CreatePrintRun.aspx" },
00048                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction = PwasAction.Update,
00049                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.Self, Text = "Add Orders to Print Run", NavigateUrl = "~/workerView_AddToPrintRun.aspx" },
00050                 new PWASNavigationNode(){ PwasObject = PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction = PwasAction.Update,
00051                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.Self, Text = "Update Print Run Status", NavigateUrl = "~/view_print_run.aspx" },

00053                                             PwasScope = PwasScope.All, Text = "Manage Roles", NavigateUrl = "~/admin_ManageRoles.aspx" },

00059         internal protected class PWASNavigationNode : System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode
00060         {
00061             internal PwasObject PwasObject { get; set; }
00062             internal PwasAction PwasAction { get; set; }
00063             internal PwasScope PwasScope { get; set; }

00070                 : base()
